instructions: Tap Messages . Select the conversation that includes the message you want to forward. Tap and hold the message you want to forward. A menu appears at the bottom of the screen that offers several choices including Copy, Save, and More (in iOS 10 , reaction options appear above the text message). Tap More . The message you selected has a blue checkmark next to it, indicating that it's ready to be forwarded. Tap other empty circles to forward those messages at the same time. Tap Share (the curved arrow). A new text message screen appears with the message or messages you're forwarding copied in the text area. In the To field, type the name or phone number of the person you want to forward the message to. Include more than one person to send a group message. Tap Send .
